definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: stir up, disturb, trouble (NH id., make turbid; Ar. 9akira be turbid);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וּכְאֵבִי נֶעְכָָּר]] Ps 39:3 my pain was stirred up; Pt. f. [[נֶעְכָָּרֶת]] Pr 15:6 usu. as n. abstr. disturbance, calamity, but < read [[וּתְבוּאַת רָשָׁע]] [[[ה]]][[נִכְרָָת]] the income of the wicked is cut off (Toy).
